```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(chartjs)
```

## Bar

```{r bar}
chartjs(height = "500px") %>%
  cjsBar(labels = LETTERS[1:10]) %>%
  # cjsAddScale("y", type = "linear") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 1") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 2") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 3") %>% 
  cjsLegend() %>% 
  cjsTooltips(fontSize = 20, fontColor = "#F00000")
```

## Line

```{r line}
chartjs(height = "500px") %>%
  cjsLine(labels = seq.Date(as.Date("2011-01-01"), as.Date("2011-01-08"), by = 1)) %>%
  cjsEditScale("x", 1, type = "time") %>% 
  cjsEditScale("y", 1, type = "logarithmic") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 1") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 2") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 3") %>% 
  cjsLegend() %>% 
  cjsTooltips(fontSize = 20, fontColor = "#F00000")
```


## Pie 

```{r pie}
chartjs() %>%
  cjsPie(labels = LETTERS[1:4]) %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = c(1:4))
```

## Doughnut 

```{r doughnut}
chartjs(chartOptions = list(animation = list(animateScale = TRUE, animateRotate = FALSE))) %>%
  cjsDoughnut(cutout = 80, labels = LETTERS[1:4]) %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = c(1:4))
```

## Radar

```{r radar}
chartjs() %>%
  cjsRadar(labels = LETTERS[1:4]) %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = round(abs(c(rnorm(4))), 2)) %>% 
  cjsEditScale(axis = NULL, ticks = list(beginAtZero = TRUE))
```

## Polar Area

```{r polararea}
chartjs() %>%
  cjsPolar(labels = LETTERS[1:4]) %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = round(abs(c(rnorm(4))), 2)) %>% 
  cjsEditScale(axis = NULL, ticks = list(beginAtZero = TRUE))
```

## Multiple y scales

```{r bar dual scales}
chartjs(height = "500px") %>%
  cjsBar(labels = LETTERS[1:10]) %>%
  cjsAddScale("y", type = "linear", position = "right") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 1") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 2") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = -abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 3", scale = 2) %>%
  cjsLegend() %>% 
  cjsTooltips(fontSize = 20, fontColor = "#F00000")
```

## Combo bar line

```{r combo bar line}
chartjs(height = "500px") %>%
  cjsBar(labels = LETTERS[1:8]) %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 1") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 2") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 3", type = "line") %>%
  cjsLegend() %>% 
  cjsTooltips(fontSize = 20, fontColor = "#F00000")
```
